summary: On its way to Denver, a cargo of whiskey destined for the miners, is sought after by the Temperance League, the U.S. Cavalry, the local Indians and the miners themselves.
cast: Burt Lancaster|Lee Remick|Jim Hutton|Pamela Tiffin|Donald Pleasence|Brian Keith|Martin Landau|John Anderson|Tom Stern|Robert J. Wilke|Dub Taylor|Whit Bissell|Helen Kleeb|Val Avery|Noam Pitlik|William 'Billy' Benedict|Hope Summers|Ted Markland|Larry Duran|Jerry Gatlin|Marshall Reed|Jim Burk|John McKee|Bing Russell|Buff Brady|Carl Pitti|Carroll Adams|Oscar Blank|Bill Borzage|Danny Borzage|Russell Custer|John Dehner|Bobby Gilbert|Raven Grey Eagle|Herman Hack|Carol Henry|Eddie Little Sky|Elaine Martone|Mathew McCue|Karla Most|Victor Romito|Rudy Sooter|Arthur Tovey|Bill Williams|Chalky Williams|Harry Wilson
title: La batalla de las colinas del whisky
